Game Introduction

You are traveling across a fantastic world full of beautiful girls,
that can tell you their stories about their self and share with you their beauty

FEATURES


  • 44 levels of relaxed puzzle game
  • 11 charming girls
  • relaxing music
  • High quality art

Thank you all for your support of Kawaii Hentai.
